whatIs.title: WHAT IS PLOTMATE STORYBOARDS?
whatIs.description: PLOTMATE STORYBOARDS is a generative storyboard and shot design system. A fully searchable, high-definition image library for filmmakers. Use the power of Gemini to find the exact image you need, create storyboards, and manage your visual assets from script to screen.

generate.title: GENERATE ANY SHOT
generate.description: From a wide establishing shot to a detailed insert, describe what you need and watch it come to life. Our generative AI, powered by Gemini, creates photorealistic storyboard frames based on your exact specifications: shot size, composition, camera angle, lens, and more.

workflow.title: SCRIPT-TO-SCREEN WORKFLOW
workflow.description: Upload your script and let our AI automatically break it down into scenes. From there, manage your cast, props, and locations. Generate shot sequences for entire scenes, and maintain visual continuity with our top-down planning view.

testimonial.quote: "PLOTMATE STORYBOARDS has completely changed how I prep. The speed at which I can visualize a scene is incredible. It's an indispensable tool for any director."
testimonial.author: - Jane Doe
testimonial.title: Director, "The Last Frame"

ctaSection.description: Unlock the future of filmmaking. It's free to get started.

hero.title: FEATURES
hero.subtitle: From Script to Screen: The Complete Visual Toolkit

generation.title: AI Storyboard Generation
generation.description: Describe any shot with detailed cinematographic terms—shot size, angle, lens, lighting—and watch Gemini create photorealistic frames instantly.

workflow.title: Script-to-Screen Workflow
workflow.description: Upload your script in various formats. Our AI analyzes the text, automatically breaking it down into scenes and identifying characters, props, and locations.

library.title: Dynamic Cast & Prop Library
library.description: Manage all your project's assets. Upload reference photos for actors and props, and our AI generates visual descriptions and smart-crops images for perfect compositions.

scouting.title: AI Location Scouting
scouting.description: Leverage Google Maps grounding to get rich, cinematic descriptions of real-world locations just by entering an address, guiding your location-based shot generation.

continuity.title: Visual Continuity Planning
continuity.description: Use the top-down continuity view to plan camera placements for entire scenes. Our AI helps you maintain continuity by automatically warning you of 180-degree line crosses.

welcome.title: Welcome to PLOTMATE STORYBOARDS
welcome.description: The ultimate visual toolkit for filmmakers. Create AI-generated storyboards and shot designs from script to screen -- all running locally in your browser.
welcome.detail: This quick tour will walk you through the key features. You can skip at any time.
highlights: AI-powered storyboard image generation
Script breakdown and scene management
Visual continuity planning tools

projects.title: Project Library
projects.description: Your creative home base. All projects live here with search, sort, and quick preview.
projects.detail: Each project contains its own scenes, shots, cast, props, and locations -- everything organized in one place.
highlights: Duplicate projects to reuse setups
Full workspace backup and restore
Import/export your entire library

scenes.title: Script to Scenes
scenes.description: Upload a script (PDF, TXT, or Fountain) and let AI automatically break it down into scenes with characters, props, and locations.
scenes.detail: Or create scenes manually. The Project Assets Manager lets you import from the Media Library and use AI to describe your actors and locations.
highlights: Drag-and-drop scene reordering
Per-scene lighting, mood, and color palette
Manage cast, props, and locations per project

shotBuilder.title: Shot Builder & AI
shotBuilder.description: The heart of the app. Define precise camera parameters and generate photorealistic storyboard frames with AI.
shotBuilder.detail: Set shot size, angle, movement, lens, DOF, and more. Use the AI Shot Assistant to describe a shot in plain English and let AI set the parameters.
highlights: Natural language shot interpretation
AI shot sequence suggestions for entire scenes
AI location scouting by address
Image editing and refinement

continuity.title: Continuity & Gallery
continuity.description: Plan camera placements on a top-down floor plan and review all shots in a visual gallery grid.
continuity.detail: The Continuity View helps you maintain visual consistency. The Gallery View gives you a bird's-eye view of every shot in a scene.
highlights: 180-degree line with automatic crossing warnings
FOV cones and shot sequence path visualization
Drag-and-drop gallery reordering
Undo/Redo support in continuity editor

mediaLibrary.title: Media Library
mediaLibrary.description: A global collection of actors, props, and locations you can reuse across all projects.
mediaLibrary.detail: Upload reference photos and AI will generate descriptions. Import assets directly into any project from the library.
highlights: Folder organization with tags and search
AI face detection and smart cropping for actors
AI-generated visual descriptions
Bulk upload and management

export.title: Export & Share
export.description: Export your storyboards in multiple formats for production use.
export.detail: Share a polished PDF with clients, hand a shot list to your DP, or send a portable HTML file that works offline.
highlights: PDF: Client Storyboard, Shot List, Presentation Deck
Image assets as ZIP (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
Portable HTML viewer (self-contained, no server)
Full workspace backup and restore

apiSetup.title: API Setup
apiSetup.description: PLOTMATE uses your own Google Gemini API key for all AI features. Your key stays local and is never sent to external servers.
apiSetup.detail: Head to API & Settings in the sidebar to enter your key. All data stays in your browser -- nothing is uploaded.
highlights: Free API key from aistudio.google.com
Optional: NanoBanana Pro for higher-fidelity images
Optional: OpenAI and Midjourney key support

ready.title: You're All Set!
ready.description: Start by creating your first project, or explore the Media Library and Settings. Happy storyboarding!
ready.detail: You can always revisit this tour from API & Settings in the sidebar.

settings.title: Onboarding Tour
settings.description: Re-watch the introductory tour that explains the key features of the app.
settings.resetConfirmation: Onboarding will show on next page load. Refresh to see it now.

lightingSetup.title: Light Your Scenes Like a Pro
lightingSetup.description: Set up realistic lighting for each scene and watch it transform your AI-generated storyboard frames. The AI reads your exact lighting configuration — source type, direction, color, and modifiers — to produce cinematic, production-ready images.
lightingSetup.detail: Find the Lighting Setup section at the bottom of every scene form. Even a single key light dramatically improves image quality.
highlights: 7 source types: LED panel, COB + softbox, Fresnel, HMI, and more
8 directions: front, side, backlight, underlight, and more
8 light colors including teal, purple, and neon
8 modifiers: softbox, grid, gobo, haze/fog, and more
Add unlimited lights per scene for complex setups

continuityView.title: Master Visual Continuity
continuityView.description: Plan camera placements on a top-down floor plan to ensure every shot maintains spatial consistency. The Continuity View is your visual map of the entire scene.
continuityView.detail: Access Continuity View from the Shot Builder toolbar. It prevents the most common editing mistake — accidentally crossing the line of action.
highlights: Place characters and set elements on an interactive grid
Draw the 180° line — get automatic crossing warnings
FOV cones show exactly what each camera sees
Shot sequence path traces camera movement order
Full undo/redo support for all placements

lightingHint.title: Lighting Setup — Your Secret Weapon
lightingHint.description: Define per-scene lighting and the AI will render it faithfully. Source type, direction, color, modifiers — every detail shapes your generated frames.
highlights: Directly influences AI image generation quality
Multiple lights per scene for complex setups
Modifiers like softbox, grid, gobo, and haze

onboarding.lightingProTip: Adding lights here directly shapes how AI generates your storyboard images. Try adding a key light!
